revised_title: Finite Compression of Elastic Solid Cylinders in the Presence of Gravity
tldr: The author investigates the deformation of an elastic solid cylinder under the influence of gravity and finite axial compression. They develop a mathematical model to predict the compression of the cylinder and demonstrate its application in determining the material properties of soft elastic materials like gelatin. The study also shows that gelatin behaves more like a Mooney material than a material with a quadratic form for the strain energy function.
